name: Primal Order
trigger: when you choose your primal order
effects: Magician: you learn one extra druid cantrip and gain a bonus to Intelligence (Arcana or Nature) checks equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1)
Warden: you gain proficiency with Martial weapons and training with Medium armor

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/04-Character Classes - Players Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
